title: Differentiable Information Enhanced Model-Based Reinforcement Learning
details: X Zhang, X Cai, B Liu, W Huang, SC Zhu, S Qi, Y Yang - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Differentiable environments have heralded new possibilities for learning control policies by offering rich differentiable information that facilitates gradient-based methods. In comparison to prevailing model-free reinforcement learning approaches …
